channel.title: No King Vote after King died
channel.description:
#### What happened? we exed a neutral king, then the next morning a drunk and another player stepped up to replace, game glitched a bit and then it said in chat everyone abstained from vote, and thus no king
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Everyone should have been able to vote for king
#### Steps to reproduce:Not sure
#### Comments:
![bugged|690x387](upload://nChWakqhdh6EpfVKIj1FRP7gEwC.jpg)

item.title: No King Vote after King died

item.description:
What happened? we exed a neutral king, then the next morning a drunk and another player stepped up to replace, game glitched a bit and then it said in chat everyone abstained from vote, and thus no king

What was SUPPOSED to happen? Everyone should have been able to vote for king
